extendedInfo.description: From finding a book in the catalog to placing a hold, or finding a due date for a book, you can do it from the convenience of this mobile app. -Need to know where a library is or what its hours are? Simple -- check it out on our mobile app. -Want an answer to a question? It's as easy as e-mailing or calling from the app. -Social butterfly? You'll find it easier than ever to connect with us via Facebook, Twitter, Flickr and YouTube.  Find out what else you can do with the Stanislaus County Library mobile app.

reviews.title: Very useful.
reviews.comment: Prefer this to actually going to comp, turn it on, log in... this makes it all very quick and easy. Super efficient.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Simply the Best
reviews.comment: Our library online ordering system is the best thing going in the whole valley.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Useful but searching difficult
reviews.comment: Very useful. But you cannot search a specific library to see what they carry. You have to search a title, then see who has it. Very time consuming.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: SCFL
reviews.comment: Works well for first release. I\'d prefer white/gray colors instead of the light blue.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Love our library. vote yes in june.
reviews.author: A Google User
